item.name: Tap shift to move over words
item.appendix: Shift keys move the cursor one word forward or backward when pressed alone. When used with other keys they act as normal shifts.
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::SHIFT_R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L

item.name: Remap F19 to Hyper
item.appendix: OS X doesn't have a Hyper. This maps F19 to Control + Shift + Option + Command.
item.autogen:
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::F19,
KeyCode::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R

item.autogen:

KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN
